pr_title: Make sure not to remove the configuration from builtin services

timeline.message: Make sure not to remove the configuration from builtin services
Make sure not to remove the configuration from builtin services
Make sure not to remove the configuration from builtin services

timeline.bodyText: Is this always correct? What if the customers want to reset a configuration of a built-in service?
timeline.author: fengwang666

replies.bodyText: Customers aren't able to set the configuration for builtins
replies.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: Anyway updated it so that if the service is in the new config, then we'll use the default (replace).
replies.author: MikeDombo
